# light

𒌓 LAH la₇ liḫ 𒇺 liš Licht light solara 𓇳 日 ⇔ 𒉌𒌓 lí.utᵘ 𒇷 LIᵗʰ 𒎎 lithᵒ 𓊌 ⇔ 𒆪 𒉇 𒌆 ˡᶥTU

𒌓 ˡUT ʷUT 𒌓𒁕 ʷUT.DA light (white)

light

Abkhaz: алашара (alašara) la'sara
Aromanian: lunjinã ⇔ lune
Mandarin: 光亮 guāngliàng
Armenian: լույս (hy) (luys)
Gothic: 𐌻𐌹𐌿𐌷𐌰𐌸 n (liuhaþ)

ge.licht

Cornish: golow ⇔ glow

illuminare

Bengali: আলো (bn) (alo)
French: lumière
Hawaiian: lama, ao

aura 𓇶𓇳 halo

Hebrew: אוֹרָה (he) f (orá), אוֹר (he) m (ór)
Coptic: ⲟⲩⲱⲓⲛⲓ
Bengali: আলো (bn) (alo)

na.aura 𓇑𓇳

𒉢 NU ⋍ 𒉡𒊑 نُور nūr : light 1/noir

𒉡𒊒 nu-ru
𒉡𒊒 light , shine

𒉡𒉿𒊑𒅎 nu-wu-ri-im
𒉡𒉿𒊑𒅎 illuminating

𒈬𒈾𒉿𒅕 mu-na-wi-ir √light 𒉢 NU ⋍ 𒉡𒊑 نُور nūr
𒈬𒈾𒉿𒅕 brighten

bright ⇔ fire

Korean: 빛 (ko) (bit),

## laila / night ≠ nuhhārā

sweet white ≠ schwatt

světъ, from Proto-Indo-European *ḱweytos “bright; shine”.

nūr ≠ noir 𓇱

𒂟 nûru 𒉢 NU ⋍
𒉡𒊑 nu-re نُور nūr : light 1/noir ⇔ nabu 𒀭𒀝
